verses.verse: Then <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> you the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, To <S%H4279>morrow<s%> about this <S%H6256>time<s%> shall a <S%H5429>measure<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> be sold for a <S%H8255>shekel<s%>, and two <S%H5429>measures<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> for a <S%H8255>shekel<s%>, in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>.

Then a <S%H7991>lord<s%> on whose <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8172>leaned<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3068>Behold<s%>, if the Lord would <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H699>windows<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, might this <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H559>be<s%>? And he said, <S%H7200>Behold<s%>, you shall see it with your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, but shall not eat <S%H398>there<s%>.

And there were <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6879>leprous<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> at the entering <S%H6607>in<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>: and they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H7453>another<s%>, Why <S%H3427>sit<s%> we here until we <S%H4191>die<s%>?

If we <S%H559>say<s%>, We will <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%>, then the <S%H7458>famine<s%> is in the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and we shall <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H3427>there<s%>: and if we sit still <S%H4191>here<s%>, we die <S%H3212>also<s%>. Now therefore come, and let us <S%H5307>fall<s%> unto the <S%H4264>army<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians<s%>: if they save us <S%H2421>alive<s%>, we shall <S%H2421>live<s%>; and if they <S%H4191>kill<s%> <S%H4191>us<s%>, we shall but die.

And they rose <S%H6965>up<s%> in the <S%H5399>twilight<s%>, to <S%H935>go<s%> unto the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians<s%>: and when they were <S%H935>come<s%> to the outermost <S%H7097>part<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%>, <S%H376>behold<s%>, there was no man there.

For the <S%H136>Lord<s%> had made the <S%H4264>army<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> a <S%H6963>noise<s%> of <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and a <S%H6963>noise<s%> of <S%H5483>horses<s%>, even the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%>: and they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another<s%>, <S%H4428>Behold<s%>, the king of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H7936>hired<s%> against us the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H2850>Hittites<s%>, and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>, to come upon <S%H935>us<s%>.

Therefore they <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H5127>fled<s%> in the <S%H5399>twilight<s%>, and <S%H5800>left<s%> their <S%H168>tents<s%>, and their <S%H5483>horses<s%>, and their <S%H2543>donkeys<s%>, even the <S%H4264>camp<s%> as it <S%H5127>was<s%>, and fled for their <S%H5315>life<s%>.

And when these <S%H6879>lepers<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the outermost <S%H7097>part<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, they <S%H935>went<s%> into <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H168>tent<s%>, and did <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%>, and <S%H5375>carried<s%> there <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H899>clothes<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H2934>hid<s%> <S%H7725>it<s%>; and came again, and <S%H935>entered<s%> into <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H168>tent<s%>, and <S%H5375>carried<s%> there <S%H3212>also<s%>, and went and hid <S%H2934>it<s%>.

Then they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H7453>another<s%>, We <S%H6213>do<s%> not <S%H3117>well<s%>: this day is a <S%H3117>day<s%> of good <S%H1309>news<s%>, and we hold our <S%H2814>peace<s%>: if we <S%H2442>stay<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H216>light<s%>, some <S%H5771>mischief<s%> will <S%H4672>come<s%> upon <S%H3212>us<s%>: now therefore come, that we may <S%H935>go<s%> and <S%H5046>tell<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>household<s%>.

So they <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> unto the <S%H7778>porter<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>: and they <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>, saying, We <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians<s%>, <S%H376>and<s%>, behold, there was no man <S%H6963>there<s%>, neither voice of <S%H120>man<s%>, but <S%H5483>horses<s%> <S%H631>tied<s%>, and <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> <S%H631>tied<s%>, and the tents as they <S%H168>were<s%>.
And he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H7778>porters<s%>; and they <S%H5046>told<s%> it to the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H6441>inside<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> in the <S%H3915>night<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, I will now <S%H5046>show<s%> you what the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> have <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3045>us<s%>. They know that we are <S%H7457>hungry<s%>; therefore are they gone <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to <S%H2247>hide<s%> themselves in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, When they come <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, we shall <S%H8610>catch<s%> them <S%H2416>alive<s%>, and <S%H935>get<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

And <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, Let some <S%H3947>take<s%>, I pray <S%H2568>you<s%>, five of the <S%H5483>horses<s%> that <S%H7604>remain<s%>, which are <S%H7604>left<s%> in the <S%H1995>city<s%>, (behold, they are as all the multitude of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that are <S%H7604>left<s%> in <S%H1995>it<s%>: behold, I say, they are even as all the multitude of the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> that are <S%H8552>consumed<s%>:) and let us <S%H7971>send<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%>.

They <S%H3947>took<s%> therefore <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7393>chariot<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%>; and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4264>army<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%>.

And they <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them unto <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>: <S%H1870>and<s%>, behold, all the way was <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H899>garments<s%> and <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, which the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> had cast <S%H7993>away<s%> in their <S%H2648>haste<s%>. And the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%>, and <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%>, and <S%H962>spoiled<s%> the <S%H4264>tents<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians<s%>. So a <S%H5429>measure<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> was sold for a <S%H8255>shekel<s%>, and two <S%H5429>measures<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> for a <S%H8255>shekel<s%>, according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6485>appointed<s%> the <S%H7991>lord<s%> on whose <S%H3027>hand<s%> he <S%H8172>leaned<s%> to have the charge of the <S%H8179>gate<s%>: and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7429>trod<s%> upon him in the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, and he <S%H4191>died<s%>, as the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H1696>said<s%>, who <S%H1696>spoke<s%> when the <S%H4428>king<s%> came down to <S%H3381>him<s%>.

And it came to pass as the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Two <S%H5429>measures<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> for a <S%H8255>shekel<s%>, and a <S%H5429>measure<s%> of fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> for a <S%H8255>shekel<s%>, shall be to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> about this <S%H6256>time<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>:

And that <S%H7991>lord<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3068>Now<s%>, behold, if the Lord should <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H699>windows<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, might such a <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H559>be<s%>? And he said, <S%H7200>Behold<s%>, you shall see it with your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, but shall not eat <S%H398>there<s%>.
And so it fell out unto <S%H5971>him<s%>: for the people <S%H7429>trod<s%> upon him in the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, and he <S%H4191>died<s%>.
